      • createSession

        public static com.jcraft.jsch.Session createSession​(java.lang.String host,
                                                    int port,
                                                    java.lang.String username,
                                                    java.lang.String password,
                                                    java.lang.String privateKeyFileName,
                                                    java.lang.String passphrase)
                                             throws com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException
        Returns a new session created with given host, port, username, password, privateKey and optional passphrase.
        Parameters:
        host - the host to connect to.
        port - the port to connect to.
        username - the username to use.
        password - the password to use.
        privateKeyFileName - the private key file to use.
        passphrase - the passphrase to use.
        Returns:
        a new session.
        Throws:
        com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException - if username or host are invalid, or if passphrase is not right.

        username - the username to use.
        password - the password to use.
        Returns:
        a new session.
